column4: i have ubuntu successfully installed, but i cannot log in because it does not recognize my keyboard input.  during installation, i was about to get the keyboard to respond by changing the device input, but this option is not available at login.  any ideas?
try asking in the forums rather than repeating yourself every 10 minutes
also ask during the day when there are more people here.
sorry for being bothersome i have been struggling with this problem all day
